scripts.travis:iex-luxcium-api: npm run test:ci && npm run build && npm run copy:static:files
scripts.posttravis: npm run prebuild && ls && cd .. && pwd && ls
scripts.pretest: tsc --noEmit --pretty && npm run lint && npm run smoke:test
scripts.debug: cd /Users/neb_401/Developer/neb401corp/LuxciumProject/iex-luxcium-api; env NODE_ENV=development env NODE_ENV=development /Users/neb_401/.nvm/versions/node/v10.15.3/bin/node -r ts-node/register ./src/main.ts
scripts.copy:static:files: cp-cli README.md build/README.md && npm run copy:static:3
scripts.predist: npm run test && npm run build && npm run copy:static:files && npm run gitcheck
scripts.local:predist: npm run pretest && tsc && npm run copy:static:files
